page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area covered on the twelve kilometres squared map consisted of {Addlestone,Weybridge,St.George's Hill {New Haw and part of Woodham. { }There are many different types of houses in this area ranging from small flats in Addlestone to large modern, detached houses in Weybridge or St.George's. There is a main line railway track running to Waterloo station, which can be joined at{Byfleet and New Haw {station,}which is thirty-six minutes away from Waterloo station. Some of the major employers in this area,are the veterinary,Laboratory, British Aerospace and Plessey's,but many workers travel by train to their London jobs. In addition to the main employers there are many other large and small industries
